protein.specific_function: Primary vitamin B12-binding and transport protein. Delivers cobalamin to cells

reference.reference_text: Platica O, Janeczko R, Quadros EV, Regec A, Romain R, Rothenberg SP: The cDNA sequence and the deduced amino acid sequence of human transcobalamin II show homology with rat intrinsic factor and human transcobalamin I. J Biol Chem. 1991 Apr 25;266(12):7860-3.
